metadata.name: Potential PowerShell Downgrade Attack
metadata.comment: Detects PowerShell downgrade attack by comparing the host versions with the actually used engine version 2.0

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -version 2 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -versio 2 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -versi 2 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -vers 2 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -ver 2 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -ve 2 ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' -v 2 '))))

output.summary: Detects PowerShell downgrade attack by comparing the host versions with the actually used engine version 2.0
